thm strleun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wbr(cun(c0, c1), cstr, cop(c2, c3))
  -| wbr(c0, cstr, cop(c2, c4))
  -| wbr(c1, cstr, cop(c5, c3))
  -| wbr(c4, clt, c5)
} = {
  mpbir3an(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cstr, cop(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c3)), wfun(cdif(cun(c0, c1), csn(emptycls))), wss(cdm(cun(c0, c1)), co(c2, cfz, c3)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c3))
  mp2an(wbr(c2, cle, c3), wbr(c2, cle, c5), wbr(c5, cle, c3))
  letri(c2, c5, c3)
  mpbir(wfun(cdif(cun(c0, c1), csn(emptycls))), wfun(cun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))))
  mp2an(wfun(cun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wa(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wfun(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wceq(cin(cdm(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdm(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), emptycls))
  pm3.2i(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wfun(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))))
  simp2i(wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c4, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c4)), wss(cdm(c0), co(c2, cfz, c4)))
  simp2i(wfun(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))), w3a(wcel(c5, cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c5, cle, c3)), wss(cdm(c1), co(c5, cfz, c3)))
  mp2an(wceq(cin(cdm(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdm(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), emptycls), wss(cin(cdm(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdm(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), cin(co(c2, cfz, c4), co(c5, cfz, c3))), wceq(cin(co(c2, cfz, c4), co(c5, cfz, c3)), emptycls))
  mp2an(wss(cin(cdm(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdm(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), cin(co(c2, cfz, c4), co(c5, cfz, c3))), wss(cdm(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), co(c2, cfz, c4)), wss(cdm(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))), co(c5, cfz, c3)))
  sstri(cdm(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), co(c2, cfz, c4), cdm(c0))
  ax-mp(wss(cdm(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdm(c0)), wss(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0))
  difss(c0, csn(emptycls))
  dmss(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0)
  sstri(cdm(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))), co(c5, cfz, c3), cdm(c1))
  ax-mp(wss(cdm(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))), cdm(c1)), wss(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)), c1))
  difss(c1, csn(emptycls))
  dmss(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)), c1)
  ss2in(cdm(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), co(c2, cfz, c4), cdm(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))), co(c5, cfz, c3))
  ax-mp(wceq(cin(co(c2, cfz, c4), co(c5, cfz, c3)), emptycls), wbr(c4, clt, c5))
  fzdisj(c4, c5, c2, c3)
  sseq0(cin(cdm(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdm(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))), cin(co(c2, cfz, c4), co(c5, cfz, c3)))
  funun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls)))
  funeqi(cdif(cun(c0, c1), csn(emptycls)), cun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls)), cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))))
  difundir(c0, c1, csn(emptycls))
  eqsstri(cdm(cun(c0, c1)), co(c2, cfz, c3), cun(cdm(c0), cdm(c1)))
  dmun(c0, c1)
  unssi(cdm(c0), cdm(c1), co(c2, cfz, c3))
  sstri(cdm(c0), co(c2, cfz, c3), co(c2, cfz, c4))
  simp3i(wss(cdm(c0), co(c2, cfz, c4)), w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c4, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c4)), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  ax-mp(wss(co(c2, cfz, c4), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c4)))
  mpbir3an(wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c4)), wcel(c4, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wbr(c4, cle, c3))
  nnzi(c4)
  nnzi(c3)
  mp2an(wbr(c4, cle, c3), wbr(c4, cle, c5), wbr(c5, cle, c3))
  simp3i(wbr(c5, cle, c3), wcel(c5, cn), wcel(c3, cn))
  letri(c4, c5, c3)
  nnrei(c3)
  simp2i(wcel(c3, cn), wcel(c5, cn), wbr(c5, cle, c3))
  eluz2(c3, c4)
  fzss2(c3, c4, c2)
  sstri(cdm(c1), co(c2, cfz, c3), co(c5, cfz, c3))
  simp3i(wss(cdm(c1), co(c5, cfz, c3)), w3a(wcel(c5, cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c5, cle, c3)), wfun(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))))
  ax-mp(wss(co(c5, cfz, c3), co(c2, cfz, c3)), wcel(c5, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  mpbir3an(wcel(c5, cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c5, cz), wbr(c2, cle, c5))
  nnzi(c2)
  nnzi(c5)
  mp2an(wbr(c2, cle, c5), wbr(c2, cle, c4), wbr(c4, cle, c5))
  simp3i(wbr(c2, cle, c4), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c4, cn))
  ltleii(c4, c5)
  letri(c2, c4, c5)
  nnrei(c2)
  simp1i(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c4, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c4))
  nnrei(c4)
  simp2i(wcel(c4, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c4))
  simp1i(w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c4, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c4)), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wss(cdm(c0), co(c2, cfz, c4)))
  mpbi(w3a(w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c4, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c4)), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wss(cdm(c0), co(c2, cfz, c4))), wbr(c0, cstr, cop(c2, c4)))
  isstruct(c0, c2, c4)
  nnrei(c5)
  simp1i(wcel(c5, cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c5, cle, c3))
  simp1i(w3a(wcel(c5, cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c5, cle, c3)), wfun(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))), wss(cdm(c1), co(c5, cfz, c3)))
  mpbi(w3a(w3a(wcel(c5, cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c5, cle, c3)), wfun(cdif(c1, csn(emptycls))), wss(cdm(c1), co(c5, cfz, c3))), wbr(c1, cstr, cop(c5, c3)))
  isstruct(c1, c5, c3)
  eluz2(c5, c2)
  fzss1(c5, c2, c3)
  isstruct(cun(c0, c1), c2, c3)
}

thm strleun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚ãÉ c1)[Struct]< c2, c3 >
  ‚ä£ c0[Struct]< c2, c4 >
  ‚ä£ c1[Struct]< c5, c3 >
  ‚ä£ c4[<]c5
} = {
  mpbir3an((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)[Struct]< c2, c3 >, (c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c2[‚â§]c3), Fun(((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)\ { ‚àÖ })), dom((c0 ‚ãÉ c1))‚äÜ(c2[...]c3))
  3pm3.2i(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c2[‚â§]c3)
  mp2an(c2[‚â§]c3, c2[‚â§]c5, c5[‚â§]c3)

  pm3.2i(Fun((c0 \ { ‚àÖ })), Fun((c1 \ { ‚àÖ })))
  simp2i(Fun((c0 \ { ‚àÖ })), (c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c4 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c2[‚â§]c4), dom(c0)‚äÜ(c2[...]c4))
  simp2i(Fun((c1 \ { ‚àÖ })), (c5 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c5[‚â§]c3), dom(c1)‚äÜ(c5[...]c3))
  mp2an((dom((c0 \ { ‚àÖ }))‚ãÇ dom((c1 \ { ‚àÖ })))= ‚àÖ, (dom((c0 \ { ‚àÖ }))‚ãÇ dom((c1 \ { ‚àÖ })))‚äÜ((c2[...]c4)‚ãÇ(c5[...]c3)), ((c2[...]c4)‚ãÇ(c5[...]c3))= ‚àÖ)
  mp2an((dom((c0 \ { ‚àÖ }))‚ãÇ dom((c1 \ { ‚àÖ })))‚äÜ((c2[...]c4)‚ãÇ(c5[...]c3)), dom((c0 \ { ‚àÖ }))‚äÜ(c2[...]c4), dom((c1 \ { ‚àÖ }))‚äÜ(c5[...]c3))
  sstri(dom((c0 \ { ‚àÖ })), (c2[...]c4), dom(c0))

  difss(c0, { ‚àÖ })
  dmss((c0 \ { ‚àÖ }), c0)
  sstri(dom((c1 \ { ‚àÖ })), (c5[...]c3), dom(c1))
  ax-mp(dom((c1 \ { ‚àÖ }))‚äÜ dom(c1), (c1 \ { ‚àÖ })‚äÜ c1)
  difss(c1, { ‚àÖ })
  dmss((c1 \ { ‚àÖ }), c1)
  ss2in(dom((c0 \ { ‚àÖ })), (c2[...]c4), dom((c1 \ { ‚àÖ })), (c5[...]c3))
  ax-mp(((c2[...]c4)‚ãÇ(c5[...]c3))= ‚àÖ, c4[<]c5)
  fzdisj(c4, c5, c2, c3)
  sseq0((dom((c0 \ { ‚àÖ }))‚ãÇ dom((c1 \ { ‚àÖ }))), ((c2[...]c4)‚ãÇ(c5[...]c3)))
  funun((c0 \ { ‚àÖ }), (c1 \ { ‚àÖ }))
  funeqi(((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)\ { ‚àÖ }), ((c0 \ { ‚àÖ })‚ãÉ(c1 \ { ‚àÖ })))
  difundir(c0, c1, { ‚àÖ })
  eqsstri(dom((c0 ‚ãÉ c1)), (c2[...]c3), (dom(c0)‚ãÉ dom(c1)))
  dmun(c0, c1)
  unssi(dom(c0), dom(c1), (c2[...]c3))
  sstri(dom(c0), (c2[...]c3), (c2[...]c4))
  simp3i(dom(c0)‚äÜ(c2[...]c4), (c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c4 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c2[‚â§]c4), Fun((c0 \ { ‚àÖ })))

  mp2an(c2[‚â§]c5, c2[‚â§]c4, c4[‚â§]c5)
  simp3i(c2[‚â§]c4, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c4 ‚àà ‚Ñï)

blocks.content: Make a structure from a singleton. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Aug-2015.)

thm strle1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wbr(csn(cop(c0, c1)), cstr, cop(c2, c2))
  -| wcel(c2, cn)
  -| wceq(c0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir3an(wbr(csn(cop(c0, c1)), cstr, cop(c2, c2)), w3a(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c2)), wfun(cdif(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls))), wss(cdm(csn(cop(c0, c1))), co(c2, cfz, c2)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wbr(c2, cle, c2))
  leidi(c2)
  nnrei(c2)
  pm2.61i(wfun(cdif(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls))), wcel(c1, universe))
  mpsyl(wcel(c1, universe), wfun(cdif(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls))), wss(cdif(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls)), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wfun(csn(cop(c0, c1))))
  difss(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls))
  mpan(wcel(c1, universe), wfun(csn(cop(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, cn))
  eqeltri(c0, cn, c2)
  funsng(c0, cn, c1, universe)
  funss(cdif(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls)), csn(cop(c0, c1)))
  mpbiri(wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wfun(cdif(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls))), wfun(emptycls))
  fun0()
  funeqd(cdif(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl6eq(cdif(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls)), emptycls, cdif(csn(emptycls), csn(emptycls)), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  difeq1d(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls), csn(emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  sneqd(cop(c0, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  opprc2(c1, c0)
  difid(csn(emptycls))

  strleun(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(cop(c2, c3)), c4, c5, c4, c5)

}

  uneq2i(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(csca, cnx), c3)), cpr(cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c4), cop(cfv(cip, cnx), c5)), cun(csn(cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c4)), csn(cop(cfv(cip, cnx), c5))))
  df-pr(cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), c4), cop(cfv(cip, cnx), c5))
